trans-unit.source: Represents a single user interface (UI) entity managed by an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un'unica entità interfaccia utente gestita da una classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner" />.

trans-unit.source: The sole purpose of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> is to paint and hit test.
trans-unit.target: Al solo scopo di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> consiste nel disegnare e sottoporre a test.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> does not have a window handle (HWND), as it is rendered on the adorner window control of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> non dispone di un handle di finestra (HWND), come viene visualizzato sul controllo di finestra adorner di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> can have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> può avere un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associato.

trans-unit.source: A successfully hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> has the opportunity to push a new or different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> onto the behavior stack of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Un sottoposto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> ha la possibilità di inserire un nuovo o diverso <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> nello stack di comportamenti del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Cenni preliminari sul servizio comportamento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create your own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> based class with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare la propria <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> basato su classe con <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associato.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Può essere <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> class.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come inizializzare una nuova istanza di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> classe.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no behavior.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> oppure <see langword="null" /> se non è disponibile alcun comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i limiti dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> che rappresenta i limiti dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Bounds%2A> to create a glyph with the specific dimensions and position.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio riportato di seguito viene illustrato come eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Bounds%2A> per creare un'icona con le specifiche dimensioni e posizione.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: A point to hit-test.
trans-unit.target: Punto da sottoporre a hit test.

trans-unit.source: Provides hit test logic.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce la logica di hit test.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated with <paramref name="p" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> è associato a <paramref name="p" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A> method is an `abstract` method that forces <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> implementations to provide hit test logic.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A> metodo è un `abstract` metodo che forza <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> implementazioni per fornire la logica dell'hit test.

trans-unit.source: Given any point, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> has decided to be involved with that location, it will need to return a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>.
trans-unit.target: Dato un qualsiasi punto, se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> ha deciso di richiedere che posizione, è necessario restituire un oggetto valido <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, returning `null` will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> to ignore the location.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, restituisce `null` causerà il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> per ignorare il percorso.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A> to see if the point is within this glyph.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio riportato di seguito viene illustrato come eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A> per verificare se il punto è all'interno dell'icona.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides paint logic.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una logica di disegno.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A> method is an `abstract` method that forces <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> implementations to provide paint logic.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A> metodo è un `abstract` metodo che forza <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> implementazioni per fornire la logica di disegno.

trans-unit.source: The `pe` parameter contains the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> related to the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Il `pe` parametro contiene il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> correlate alla finestra dello strumento decorativo del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A> to draw a glyph.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio riportato di seguito viene illustrato come eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A> per disegnare un glifo.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> da associare all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: Changes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Modifica l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.SetBehavior(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior)" /> method is called by inheriting classes to change the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Il <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.SetBehavior(System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior)" /> metodo viene chiamato da classi che ereditano per modificare il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> associato il <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
